Reviews.Title: Really Nice!!
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because I got fast and free shipping on the item it came in fast a day or two after my order. Also the seller gave me good and true information on the item of its conditions. A very polite, trustworthy, and helpful person to talk to. I love my product it was a fair price and good service that I definitely recommend and will be looking forward to buying products in the future ;)
